components.title: MATHS
components.subtitle: Beginner
components.icon: Illustrative icon related to math (symbols, book)

components.title: GK
components.subtitle: Beginner

components.title: SCIENCE
components.subtitle: Beginner

layout_structure: The screen follows a vertical stacking layout. The App Bar is fixed at the top. Below it, two 'Action Cards' are arranged side-by-side in a 2-column grid. The main content area features 'Category Cards' stacked vertically, each taking up the full width (with horizontal padding). There is consistent vertical spacing between all cards and elements, and consistent horizontal padding on the main content.

color_scheme.text_primary: #FFFFFF (White) on App Bar and Category Cards

gradient_accents.purple_pink: Used for Redeem and MATHS cards
gradient_accents.blue_light_blue: Used for Rate Us and GK cards

color_scheme.icon_colors: Black outlines for Redeem/Rate Us, multi-color illustrations for categories, red for score count, yellow for money icon.

typography.font_family: Sans-serif (likely Roboto or similar system default)

spacing_and_density.overall_density: Moderate, with clear separation between components.
spacing_and_density.padding: Consistent horizontal padding applied to content within the main area. Internal padding within cards ensures content is not too close to edges.
spacing_and_density.margins: Consistent vertical margins between cards and app bar. The top action cards have horizontal margins separating them.
spacing_and_density.hit_areas: Card-based design provides large and distinct tap targets for actions and category selection.

accessibility_observations: Good contrast for primary text on the app bar and black text on white backgrounds.
Contrast for white text on gradient backgrounds (e.g., 'MATHS' on purple gradient) appears acceptable but should be verified with accessibility tools.
Large tap targets provided by the card-based layout improve usability for users with motor impairments.
Icons are generally clear and descriptive.
Font sizes for main titles and labels appear readable, but there's no visible indication of dynamic text scaling support.
notable_patterns: Card-based UI design for organizing actions and content categories.
Extensive use of colorful gradient backgrounds to differentiate sections and add visual appeal.
Illustrative, topic-specific icons/artwork for each quiz category.
Prominent display of user points/currency in the app bar, common in gamified apps.
